sn22.29:1.2: “Yo, bhikkhave, rupam abhinandati, dukkham so abhinandati.
sn22.29:1.3: Yo dukkham abhinandati, aparimutto so dukkhasmati vadami.
sn22.29:1.7: yo vinnanam abhinandati, dukkham so abhinandati.
sn22.29:1.8: Yo dukkham abhinandati, aparimutto so dukkhasmati vadami.
sn22.29:1.9: Yo ca kho, bhikkhave, rupam nabhinandati, dukkham so nabhinandati.
sn22.29:1.10: Yo dukkham nabhinandati, parimutto so dukkhasmati vadami.
sn22.29:1.14: yo vinnanam nabhinandati, dukkham so nabhinandati.
sn22.29:1.15: Yo dukkham nabhinandati, parimutto so dukkhasmati vadami”ti.
